name: Lasers, Gravity Buttons and an Astronaut
name_original: Lasers, Gravity Buttons and an Astronaut
description:
To pause, hit escape twice.

Controls

Computer:

WASD or arrow keys to move

Shift or J to interact

Space to jump

R to go back to your spawnpoint

Controller:

Left joystick to move

Y to restart

X to interact

A to jump
